item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (88 points | 87 comments)
2. Niantic announces "Large Geospatial Model" trained on Pokémon Go player data (146 points | 99 comments)
3. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (470 points | 105 comments)
4. Show HN: Self-Host Next.js in Production (53 points | 30 comments)
5. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (64 points | 6 comments)
6. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
7. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (84 points | 35 comments)
8. AAA – Analytical Anti-Aliasing (446 points | 59 comments)
9. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (75 points | 26 comments)
10. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (105 points | 10 comments)
11. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (49 points | 28 comments)
12. Google stops letting sites like Forbes rule search for "Best CBD Gummies" (135 points | 74 comments)
13. How good are American roads? (158 points | 355 comments)
14. Bird flu in Canada may have mutated to become more transmissible to humans (40 points | 6 comments)
15. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (281 points | 198 comments)
16. Europe's Internet resilience mitigates impact of submarine cable cuts (88 points | 16 comments)
17. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (36 points | 4 comments)
18. La Basilica Di San Pietro (120 points | 55 comments)
19. Between the Booms: AI in Winter – Communications of the ACM (49 points | 34 comments)
20. A Second Search for Bash Scripting Alternatives (9 points | 12 comments)
21. Exploring the Cost and Feasibility of Battery-Electric Ships (23 points | 46 comments)
22. Apple fights to keep DOJ antitrust suit from reaching trial (18 points | 2 comments)
23. Show HN: Cardo ‒ Open Source desktop podcast client (71 points | 27 comments)
24. Show HN: Rebuild of Blossom, an open-source social robot (46 points | 2 comments)
25. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (9 points | discuss)
26. How Google spent 15 years creating a culture of concealment (114 points | 105 comments)
27. A 15-minute intro to involute gears (45 points | 6 comments)
28. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (81 points | 19 comments)
29. Show HN: Unbug – Rust macros for programmatically invoking breakpoints (84 points | 36 comments)
30. FireDucks: Pandas but Faster (350 points | 157 comments)
